text: The Great Leap; Until Death Do Us Part is a 1914 silent American drama film, directed by Christy Cabanne. It stars Mae Marsh, Robert Harron, and Ralph Lewis, and was released on March 26, 1914. ==Cast list== * Mae Marsh as Mary Gibbs * Robert Harron as Bobby Dawson * Ralph Lewis * Eagle Eye * Donald Crisp * Raoul Walsh ==Production== The film opened on March 26, 1914 at Woodley's Theater in Los Angeles, California. In addition to Christy Cabanne and D. W. Griffith, the premiere was also attended by Mae Marsh, Robert Harron, Ralph Lewis, Donald Crisp and Raoul Walsh. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American drama films Category:1914 drama films Category:1914 films
title: The Great Leap; Until Death Do Us Part
